short_summary: CA, NCR: Supply of All Terrain Vehicles
description: The National Research Council is seeking the supply of All Terrain Vehicles for use within their AST site in Ontario. The existing vehicle is no longer suitable for the day to day operations and needs to be replaced.

## Summary
The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking to procure one Electric 4X4 Side by Side (Autoquad) vehicle to replace its existing utility task vehicle, which no longer satisfies the daily operational requirements

## Description of the Contract
The vehicle is essential for moving equipment and tooling within the AST site, encompassing 45 acres of land, 8 buildings, and over 2 miles of rail tracks

## Contract Requirements
The Autoquad must meet or exceed the following requirements:
- A 4x4 system to navigate terrain and weather conditions
- An electric powertrain to minimize environmental impact
- Capacity to transport personnel and equipment

## Bidder Eligibility
Only Canadian businesses are eligible to submit a bid
